name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: High-quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation and long battery life.

reviews.name: Alice
reviews.comment: Great sound quality and very comfortable to wear!

reviews.name: Bob
reviews.comment: Battery lasts long but the bass could be better.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Eco-friendly, reusable water bottle made of stainless steel. Keeps drinks cold for 24 hours.

reviews.name: Chris
reviews.comment: Perfect for hikes and very durable!

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Comfortable office chair with adjustable height and lumbar support.

reviews.name: Diana
reviews.comment: Beautiful story and a high-quality edition.

reviews.name: Eric
reviews.comment: Love this book! A timeless classic.
